column4: well i'm sure in this channel i'll get 'reverse elitism' and say i only edit samba config with vi :(
man, swat, webmin etc only make samba more confusing
nah.  If you're comfortable with vi, more power to you.  We usually recommend nano though, as it's easier than explaining to dozensof people how to use vi ;)
yeah wasn't advocating vi (never!), more saying that for most people's samba, the options in smb.conf are very simple
